qu:Page.name: Instructions
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: This questionnaire, which starts on the following page, gives you an opportunity to tell us your reactions to the system you used. Your responses will help us understand what aspects of the system you are particularly concerned about and the aspects that satisfy you. To as great a degree as possible, think about all the tasks that you have done with the system while you answer these questions. Please read each statement and indicate how strongly you agree or disagree with the statement by circling a number on the scale. If a statement does not apply to you, do not respond. Please write comments to elaborate on your answers. After you have completed this questionnaire, I'll go over your answers with you to make sure I understand all of your responses. Thank you!

qu:Page.name: System Usefulness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Overall, I am satisfied with how easy it is to use ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: System Usefulness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: It was simple to use ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: System Usefulness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I could effectively complete the tasks and scenarios using ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: System Usefulness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I was able to complete the tasks and scenarios quickly using ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: System Usefulness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I was able to efficiently complete the tasks and scenarios using ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: System Usefulness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I felt comfortable using ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: System Usefulness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: It was easy to learn to use ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: System Usefulness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I believe I could become productive quickly using ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} gave error messages that clearly told me how to fix problems..

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Whenever I made a mistake using ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}, I could recover easily and quickly.

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The information (such as on-line help, on-screen messages and other documentation) provided with ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} was clear.

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: It was easy to find the information I needed.

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The information provided for ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} was easy to understand.

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The information was effective in helping me complete the tasks and scenarios.

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The organization of information on ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} screens was clear.

qu:Page.name: Note
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The interface includes those items that you use to interact with the system. For example, some components of the interface are the keyboard, the mouse, the screens (including their use of graphics and language).

qu:Page.name: Interface Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The interface of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} was pleasant.

qu:Page.name: Interface Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I liked using the interface of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Interface Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} has all the functions and capabilities I expect it to have.

qu:Page.name: Interface Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Overall, I am satisfied with ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.
